00002 =                                                                           =

00017 #include "MisrMapQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00019 #include "MisrUnitConv.h"
00020 #include "MisrError.h"
00021 #include "proj.h"
00022 #include "gctp_prototypes.h"
00023 #include "math.h"
00024 
00043 MTKt_status MtkLatLonToLSAry(
00044   MTKt_MapInfo mapinfo, 
00045   int nelement,         
00046   const double *lat_dd, 
00047   const double *lon_dd, 
00048   float *line,          
00049   float *sample          )
00050 {
00051   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00052   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00053   int i;                        /* Loop index */
00054   MTKt_MisrProjParam pp;    /* Projection parameters */
00055   int iflg;         /* GCTP status flag */
00056   int (*for_trans[MAXPROJ+1])(double, double, double *, double *); /* Array of function ptrs (Not used) */
00057   double deg2rad = acos(-1) / 180.0;
00058 
00059   if (lat_dd == NULL || lon_dd == NULL || line == NULL || sample == NULL)
00060     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00061 
00062   if (nelement < 0)
00063     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00064 
00065   status_code = MTK_SUCCESS;
00066 
00067   status = MtkPathToProjParam(mapinfo.path, 0, &pp);
00068   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00069 
00070   for_init(pp.projcode, pp.zonecode, pp.projparam, pp.spherecode,
00071        NULL, NULL, &iflg, for_trans);
00072   if (iflg)
00073     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_GCTP_FORWARD_INIT_FAILED);
00074 
00075   for (i = 0; i < nelement; i++) {
00076     double som_x;                 /* SOM X */
00077     double som_y;                 /* SOM Y */
00078     float tline;
00079     float tsample; 
00080 
00081     iflg = somfor(lon_dd[i]*deg2rad, lat_dd[i]*deg2rad, &som_x, &som_y);
00082     if (iflg)
00083       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_GCTP_FORWARD_PROJ_FAILED);
00084 
00085     tline = (float)((som_x - mapinfo.som.ulc.x) / mapinfo.resolution);
00086     tsample = (float)((som_y - mapinfo.som.ulc.y) / mapinfo.resolution);
00087 
00088     /* Check line/sample bounds */
00089     if (tline < -0.5 || tline > mapinfo.nline - 0.5) {
00090       tline = -1.0;
00091       tsample = -1.0;
00092       status_code = MTK_OUTBOUNDS;
00093     }
00094 
00095     if (tsample < -0.5 || tsample > mapinfo.nsample - 0.5) {
00096       tline = -1.0;
00097       tsample = -1.0;
00098       status_code = MTK_OUTBOUNDS;
00099     }
00100 
00101     line[i] = tline;
00102     sample[i] = tsample;
00103   }
00104 
00105   return status_code;
00106 
00107 ERROR_HANDLE:
00108   return status_code;
00109 }
